ai-patthana12.19:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.19:0.3_0: used to be persuaded over the grasping...
ai-patthana12.19:1.1_0: You don’t take pleasure in someone who’s refuge.
ai-patthana12.19:2.1_0: ... five objects the result of the universal objects ...
ai-patthana12.19:4.1_0: ... five objects the result of the universal objects ...
